summary: A small and nice player home for travels in Riften, with a little story.
descriptionHtml:
[size=250]Ja'Qus Shack[/size]
[i]Made by the Winking Owl team[/i]
[img]http://s3.postimg.org/sys8mt9qb/Winking800x600.jpg[/img]

[b]There have been rumors of a new skooma dealer in Skyrim. It is said that he or she is making skooma right here in Skyrim, but the question is how? And nobody knows where this mysterious dealer may hide him or herself.[/b]

[youtube]8K7Ospw1724[/youtube]

[b]New Version is out: 1.2[/b]
-Ja'Qus jurnal is updated(Remeber Ja'Qu is a Khajiit, he has difficult with Imperial language but he gets better
- Added some little effects and clutter in the shack for more immersion.
-Fixed a little bugs here and there.
[b] Remember that this is just a teaser/standalone mod for our bigger mod[/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55225/?]Visit the mod![/url] [b]Probably no more updates will be coming for this mod, because this is it. This mod will be a part of Druglords of Skyrim. But still let me know of any small bugs.[/b]

To find this place you have to travel around near Riften in the wilderness, near Fort Greenwall. There is a cave entrance down a hill. Thats the place you wana start. Where exactly is for you to find out. Happy hunting dragonborn... or any other RPG character you may be playing.

This file is a small teaser for an upcoming bigger mod called: Druglords of Skyrim. Made by the same team [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55225/?]Visit the mod![/url]
author: Winking Owl

files.name: Ja'Qus Shack(Distillery no effect no sound)
